content: How can I incorporate sustainability into my Fluid Mechanics course?

Based on sustainability research in engineering education, here are specific ways to incorporate sustainability into your Fluid Mechanics course:

**Key Integration Areas:**

• **Energy Efficiency**: Focus on pump and turbine efficiency, renewable energy applications, and sustainable fluid systems
• **Environmental Impact**: Cover water treatment, pollution control, and sustainable water management practices
• **Real-world Applications**: Include case studies of sustainable fluid systems in buildings, infrastructure, and renewable energy
• **Green Technologies**: Explore wind turbines, hydroelectric power, and sustainable HVAC systems
